About Us

We hold firm to the belief that every customer should be treated with the utmost respect by assuring them that with McLaughlin Landscape Construction we will be honest and straight forward through the whole process. We also believe that our customers deserve the best quality workmanship and a clean, safe work environment, all as we move forward to completing their project in a way that will exceed their expectations.

History

McLaughlin Landscape Construction was founded in 1976 by my father Gerard P. McLaughlin who created the company out of a desire to provide for his wife and 11 children. His skill, hardwork, and honesty has been a standard that we live by and thus continue to carry on by the way we run our business and by the way we treat our customers.
